name: Trick Shot: Ping Pong
blurb: Trick Shot is a interactive 3D environment, using real life physics players try to get a ping pong ball into a strategically placed cup

rewards.reward: Trick Shot Keychain and Computer Wallpaper. Check out Keychain below. (for international backers please add $5)
We will give you a limited edition Trick Shot/Backer T-shirt. Once we are done with this campaign, no more T-Shirts will be made. See image below.(Plus keychain)(International add $10,sorry:()
Get a secret access code for an extra awesome environment that is only available for Kickstarter Backers.(Plus keychain and T-shirt)

Get an exclusive amazing looking Trick Shot sweater!! Check it out in images.PLUS we will send you a digital art book with all of our original concept ideas and comments. Get an exclusive look at what it took to make this one of a kind 3D interactive game. (Plus keychain, shirt and access code. International add 10$ please)

We will send you a SIGNED physical art book with all art from previous options PLUS behind the scene photos of the team working on the game and some environments that will not be released except for in this book.(International add 10$ for Shipping.) (Plus Keychain, Shirt, Access code, and Sweater)

Be a part of the team as a beta tester. Your input will shape the game. Let us know if you have any ideas. We will put your name into the credits as a Trick Shot Supporter. AND we will take a piece of furniture or some other item that you want and put it into our game as a prop or in the background. Just take a picture and send it to us and see it in 3D in our game. (items subject to approval) THESE 2 REWARDS ONLY AVAILABLE IN THIS TIER!!  (Plus Previous Items)(International add $10 please)

Our team will take any room your want and create an amazing 3D environment out of it and send it back to you. This is your chance to have a copy of your room forever. You will wish you had this the next time you move to a new house and miss your old room or place in your house. Get it now!!  (Plus shirt, keychain, digital art book, sweater, and access code and thanks in our game)

Ever wanted to see what your bedroom or any room in the house would look like in a game? Well now is your chance! Our design team will make one of our unique 3D environments an exact replica of any room that you choose from your house. And we will call it by YOUR NAME, in the game.  All we need is a picture and we will get it done. (Plus shirt, keychain, access code, sweater, digital art book and SPECIAL thanks in our game)

We will give you a top of the line Ping Pong table and equipment. Rackets, balls, cases and more. Have no one at home to play with? We will give you a ping pong robot as well to hit balls at you so you can practice! (Plus Shirt, Keychain, access code, sweater, digital art book, and TEAM MEMBER thanks)(US Only , add $20 for shipping please)

What could you possibly get for this you ask?Well, We will custom make for you a Ping Pong (table tennis) table based on your personal recommendations. Want a table with your face as the base? No problem. Have a company logo? Easy. Top of the line tables. We will work with you the whole way to make sure you are happy with the table. We will have our team design it and you can see the whole process from beginning to end.(some restrictions may apply due to law) AND...your picture and name will be in the game on our Hall of Fame wall! (Plus shirt, keychain, signed art book, sweater and access code) (This is worldwide and shipping is on US!!!!)
